theSenseless:RarePower.NAME: Placeholder Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, TOUCH #b

theSenseless:EarlyBirdPower.NAME: Early Bird
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, Wilt #b

theSenseless:DrunkPower.NAME: Drunk
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever your turn ends, Draw a card. At the start of your next tun, Wilt a random card from your Draw Pile for 0 Energy. Lose 1 Drunk.
